summary: Code imports the `DocumentArray` class from Jina library and initializes a new instance by reading all .jpg files from the 'Downloads' directory. Then, it plots all images in the DocumentArray as sprites into a single image file named 'sprite-img.png'.

details.comment: Code imports the `DocumentArray` class from Jina library and initializes a new instance by reading all .jpg files from the 'Downloads' directory. Then, it plots all images in the DocumentArray as sprites into a single image file named 'sprite-img.png'.
details.content:
from jina import DocumentArray
da = DocumentArray.from_files('Downloads/*.jpg')  # 从Downloads文件夹中读取所有的jpg文件，在这里你应该根据自己的路径设置
da.plot_image_sprites('sprite-img.png')  # 使用 plot_image_sprites 绘制图片集图片，如下图
